title: Topic 001 Question 104
body: Your risk management organization requires that new AWS S3 buckets must be private and encrypted at rest. How can Terraform Enterprise automatically and proactively enforce this security control?
options: With a Sentinel policy, which runs before every apply
By adding variables to each TFE workspace to ensure these settings are always enabled
With an S3 module with proper settings for buckets
Auditing cloud storage buckets with a vulnerability scanning tool
